text: Gollin is a surname. Notable people with this name include: *Alfred Gollin (1926-2005), American scholar of European history. *George Gollin (born 1953), American physics professor at the University of Illinois *Fabrizio Gollin (born 1975), Italian racing car driver *Rita K. Gollin (born 1928), Professor of English at the State University of New York, an authority on Nathaniel Hawthorne *Walter J. Gollin (1854–1927), Australian businessman, co-founder of merchants Gollin & Co ;Other uses *Gollin figure test is a psychologists' memory test ==References==
title: Gollin
